name: Redis Auto Scaling
description: A simple python project to monitor & scale redis instances

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your heroku account API key used for reading dyno info. You will find your API Key under the account settings page

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME.description: Username for the admin account. Admin login is required to access the admin interface from where you can manage your alerts

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: Password for the admin account. Must be at least 8 characters long

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL.description: Must be a valid email address. If superuser creation fails, you will have to create one manually

EMAIL_HOST.description: Host name of your SMTP server

EMAIL_PORT.description: Port where SMTP server is listening

RECIPIENTS.description: Comma separated emails of recipients who want to receive notifications

ENABLE_EMAILS.description: A global flag to enable / disable email feature

EMAIL_PREFIX.description: Notification email subject prefix for possible filter addition

N_RETENTION_DAYS.description: Number of days for which metrics need to be retained in database
